StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateQSN_Assign]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID varchar(9), @ContractID int, @BonusControlNumber varchar(20), @BonusAmount numeric(9,0), @KickerControlNumber varchar(20), @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
DECLARE @QSN_STATUS VARCHAR(1)
SELECT @QSN_STATUS = [STATUS] FROM QSN WHERE QSN_ID = @ID
IF (@QSN_STATUS = 'A') BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[dbo].[QSN] SET [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID ,[BONUS_CONTROL_NUMBER] = @BonusControlNumber ,[BONUS_AMOUNT] = @BonusAmount ,[KICKER_CONTROL] = @KickerControlNumber ,[PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE] = GetDate() ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE QSN_ID = @ID END
